faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and booking process.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: You can book a dormitory by navigating to the 'Dormitories' page, selecting your preferred room and dates, then filling out the booking form with your personal and payment transfer details. After submitting, you'll need to send payment proof via our Telegram bot for verification.
faqQ2Title: What are the check-in and check-out times for dormitories?
faqQ2Answer: Standard check-in time is 2:00 PM and check-out is at 12:00 PM (noon). If you require special arrangements, please contact the respective building administrator.
faqQ3Title: How can my company book a hall or section for an event?
faqQ3Answer: Companies must first register through our 'Register Company' link. Once your company account is approved by our admin team, you can log in, navigate to the 'Halls & Sections' page, select your desired facility/facilities and dates, and submit a booking request. Catering and other services can be specified during this process.
faqQ4Answer: For individual dormitory bookings, we require bank transfer. Details are provided during the booking process. You must then send proof of payment via our Telegram bot. For facility bookings by approved companies, payment terms (including advance payment requirements) will be outlined in the rental agreement provided after your booking request is approved.
faqQ5Answer: Yes, we offer on-site parking facilities for guests and event attendees. For very large events, please discuss parking arrangements with our team during the booking process.
faqQ6Title: How does the rental agreement process work for facility bookings?
faqQ6Answer: After your facility booking request is approved, our administration will prepare a rental agreement detailing the terms, conditions, and costs. This agreement will be sent to your company's registered contact person. You will need to sign the agreement and upload it back to us through your company dashboard on our website to finalize the booking.
faqQ7Title: Who should I contact if I have more questions or need support?
faqQ7Answer: Please visit our 'Contact Us' page. It provides contact details for specific building administrators (for dormitory queries) and general contact information for facility bookings, catering, or any other support you may need.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your smartphone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our facilities and services.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure and well-maintained dormitory rooms for individuals.

brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is dedicated to providing top-quality accommodation and event facilities. We strive for excellence in service and aim to create a welcoming environment for all our guests and clients. Our center is equipped to meet diverse needs, from individual stays to large corporate events.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and many more amenities to ensure a comfortable and productive experience!
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: High standards of cleanliness and maintenance.

globalPricingSettingsDescription: Set default prices for dormitories, halls, sections, and catering services. These prices will be used if no specific price is set on an individual item. Item-specific prices will override these defaults.
pricingHierarchyInfoDesc: Item-specific prices (set when adding/editing a dormitory, hall, or section) will override these global default prices. If an item has no specific price, these global defaults will apply.

termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified. All payments are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Usage: The client agrees to use the facility solely for the purpose stated at the time of booking and in a lawful manner. Any damages to the facility or equipment will be the responsibility of the client.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than [X] days prior to the booking date are subject to a [Y]% cancellation fee. No refunds for cancellations within [Z] days.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: {siteName} is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury to persons or property occurring during the client's use of the facility, except where caused by gross negligence of {siteName}.
